title: JhinÂ´s Last shot. Sound BUG with the High Noon Skin!
body: Jhin´s {{champion:202}}  last shot from his gun is bugged with the High Noon Skin. There is no sound before he shots the Crit Shot. I did a video to show you waht i mean.

replies.body: Yeah I saw it by a friend i hope they fix it {{champion:202}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

Hey Madiii! 

Thanks for the report! We're taking a look into what's going on here. ^-^
Thank you for the Fix.. <3 awesome to hear the sound now!
